A

addToTrie(String) - Method in class vaf.Trie
Adds the given word to the trie if possible (doesn't accept words containing characters other than A-Z, a-z)

Adds all the words in a list to the trie

G

getRoot() - Method in class vaf.Trie
Returns the trie's root
GraphAnagramMaker - Class in vaf.trieversion
A kind of anagram finder that finds anagrams using a graph-based search.
GraphAnagramMaker(Trie) - Constructor for class vaf.trieversion.GraphAnagramMaker
Initialize the anagram maker.

H

hasChildWithLetter(Character, Trie.TrieNode) - Method in class vaf.Trie
Given a letter and a trie node, returns the node that corresponds to the child of the given node with the given letter if it is in the trie, and null otherwise.

isPrefix(String) - Method in class vaf.Trie
Checks if the given string is the prefix of a word in the trie.
